NK045(bi)004:1: // bde gshegs snying po'i stong thun chen mo seng ge'i nga ro bzhugs so //
NK045(bi)004:3: gdod nas dri med sems kyi chos nyid ni //
NK045(bi)004:4: nges don 'jam dpal dpa' bo'i bdag nyid du //
NK045(bi)004:5: nges pa'i rigs lam ral gri'i rno rgyun gyis //
NK045(bi)004:6: kun rmongs srid pa'i d+r+wa ba rnam par gcod //
NK045(bi)004:7: de la 'dir dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi gsung gi snying po dgongs pa'i mthil /
NK045(bi)004:8: mdo dang sngags kyi chos kun gyi gnad gcig pu
NK045(bi)004:9: ni kun khyab bde gshegs snying po 'di kho na
NK045(bi)004:10: yin zhing / tshul 'di shin tu zab pas sa
NK045(bi)004:11: bcu'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis kyang mtshan mo'i
NK045(bi)004:12: gzugs ltar ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs dka' bar
NK045(bi)004:13: gsungs na phal pas lta ci smos /
NK045(bi)004:14: de yang ston pa bde bar gshegs pas gsung gi
NK045(bi)004:15: skabs la lar stong pa nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas
NK045(bi)004:16: bde gshegs snying po'i ngo bo gsal bar mdzad /
NK045(bi)004:17: la lar stobs sogs kyi yon tan ye ldan du
NK045(bi)004:18: bstan pa'i cha nas bde gshegs snying po'i rang bzhin
NK045(bi)004:20: de gnyis 'gal med zung du 'jug pa dgos kyang /
NK045(bi)004:21: bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i gnad zab pa las shin
NK045(bi)004:22: tu zab pa la yid ches ma rnyed pa'i dbang
NK045(bi)004:23: gis la las ni bde gshegs snying po ngo bos
NK045(bi)004:24: mi stong pa'i rtag par blta /
NK045(bi)004:25: la las ni stong rkyang tsam la bzung nas sku
NK045(bi)004:26: dang ye shes kyi yon tan 'bral med ye ldan
NK045(bi)004:27: du bzhag tu med pa'i chad lta skur 'debs kyi
NK045(bi)004:28: phyogs la gnas par gyur nas /
NK045(bi)004:29: so so'i zhe 'dod grub tu re ba'i dgag sgrub
NK045(bi)004:30: kyi ca co sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa ltar
NK045(bi)004:31: sgrogs na yang / bla ma'i man ngag gis zin
NK045(bi)004:32: pa'i skal bzang dag ni bdud rtsi'i bcud bzang snying
NK045(bi)004:33: la sims pa ltar stong pa'i dbyings dang 'od gsal
NK045(bi)004:34: ba'i ye shes 'gal med zung 'jug gi don la
NK045(bi)004:35: yid ches pa'i ngang nas snang stong gang rung gi
NK045(bi)004:36: mtha' la phyogs su 'dzin pa rnam par zhi gnas
NK045(bi)004:37: gnas pa rnams 'di skad du smra'o //
NK045(bi)004:38: de la spyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' tshad ma
NK045(bi)004:39: ni mi bslu ba'i lung yang dag yin mod kyi
NK045(bi)004:40: / de mi bslu ba nges pa la dpyad pa
NK045(bi)004:41: gsum gyis dag pas lung rnam dag tu nges pa
NK045(bi)004:42: / spyir btang / khyad par gzhung de'i sgra ji bzhin pa'i bstan don la /
NK045(bi)004:43: rig pas gnod pa med cing /
NK045(bi)004:44: sgrub byed yang dag yod pa'i sgo nas nges pa'i don du bzung dgos kyi /
NK045(bi)004:45: lung gi dag byed rigs pa bor nas /
NK045(bi)004:46: gang gshad pa la de bzhin du yid ches pa tsam kho nas mi chog ste /
NK045(bi)004:47: spyir lung la yang dag dang ltar snang /
NK045(bi)004:48: lung yang dag la'ang drang nges kyi khyad par yod pa bsnyon du med pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:49: des na so skyes thos bsam gyis sgro 'dogs bcad
NK045(bi)004:50: nas 'jug bya'i gnas rnams tshad ma gsum gyis nges
NK045(bi)004:51: nus pa rnams la ldog med kyi yid ches 'byung
NK045(bi)004:52: gi / gzhan du rang gi tshad mas ma nges
NK045(bi)004:53: shing gzhan rgol ba'i ngor sgrub par ma nus na
NK045(bi)004:54: gi / / sha za bskal don du song ba'i
NK045(bi)004:55: gang zag zhig gis mdun gyi gzhi 'dir sha za
NK045(bi)004:56: yod ces dam bca' ba dang 'dra bas tshig de
NK045(bi)004:57: 'dras rang gzhan la yid ches skyed mi nus so
NK045(bi)004:58: gi / / // de bas na yang dag pa'i
NK045(bi)004:59: rigs lam dang mthun par smra ba skye bo mkhas
NK045(bi)004:61: rigs pas grub na rgol ba'i lce rang bzhin gyis
NK045(bi)004:62: thung ngur 'gyur zhing rang gi phyogs 'dzin pa dang
NK045(bi)004:63: spro ba ldog med du skyes /
NK045(bi)004:64: rigs pas mi 'grub pa'i lam de sma ba mang
NK045(bi)004:65: po'i ji ltar brgyan kyang klan ka'i tshogs lu ma'i
NK045(bi)004:67: 'dir rgyal ba dang rgyal sras chen po brgyud par
NK045(bi)004:68: bcas pa'i lam srol rtog gis ma dkrugs pa la
NK045(bi)004:69: zhugs nas / phyogs su zhen pa po te gzu
NK045(bi)004:70: bo'i blos bde gshegs snying po'i rnam gzhag bstan pa'i
NK045(bi)004:71: tshul de dag gi sgrub byed rigs pa rnam dag
NK045(bi)004:72: la gzhal ba na bde gshegs snying po ngo bo
NK045(bi)004:73: mi stong pa'i bden grub rtag pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:74: yon tan med pa'i stong pa phyang chad du 'dod
NK045(bi)004:75: pa gnyis ka la sgrub byed med la gnod byed
NK045(bi)004:76: mthong zhing / ngo bo stong pa dang rang bzhin
NK045(bi)004:77: yon tan ye ldan gyi snying po 'gro ba'i khams
NK045(bi)004:79: gnod byed med cing sgrub byed yang dag yod par mthong ngo //
NK045(bi)004:80: de la dang po khams bde gshegs snying po 'gro
NK045(bi)004:81: ba'i rgyud la yod pa'i sgrub byed gang zhe na
NK045(bi)004:82: / theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma las /
NK045(bi)004:83: rdzogs sangs sku ni 'phro phyir dang //
NK045(bi)004:84: de bzhin nyid dbyer med phyir dang //
NK045(bi)004:85: rigs yod phyi ran lus can kun //
NK045(bi)004:86: rtag tu sangs rgyas snying po can //
NK045(bi)004:87: zhes gsungs pa'i don rigs pas gtan la dbab pa la /
NK045(bi)004:89: yang dag pa'i rang lugs rnam par bzhag pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)004:90: dang po bod snga rabs pa rnams rdzogs sangs sku
NK045(bi)004:91: 'phro ba zhes ye shes chos skus yul kun la
NK045(bi)004:93: de bzhin nyid stong rkyang tsam du rigs 'dra ba dang /
NK045(bi)004:94: rigs yod ces sangs rgya rung yin pa tsam la
NK045(bi)004:95: bshad nas rgyud bla ma'i gzhung gi snying po 'di'i
NK045(bi)004:96: thad nas gnad ma bslangs ba'i tshig nyung ngur smra'o
NK045(bi)004:97: // de la chos skus yul khyab pa tsam gyis rigs mtshan nyid pa mi 'grub ste /
NK045(bi)004:98: gzhan rgyud kyis bsdus par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi
NK045(bi)004:99: mkhyen pas yul la khyab pa tsam dngos po kun
NK045(bi)004:100: la yod kyang / de yod pa tsam gyis de kun sangs rgya ba'i rgyu mtshan med la /
NK045(bi)004:101: rang rgyud kyi chos sku ni da lta mngon du
NK045(bi)004:102: ma gyur pas rtags la the tshom za ba dang
NK045(bi)004:103: / stong pa rnam grangs pa tsam la rigs kyi don gang yang med de /
NK045(bi)004:104: khyod kyi bsam ngor rigs 'di sa bon myur gu
NK045(bi)004:105: go 'pho ba bzhin du da lta sangs rgyas kyi
NK045(bi)004:106: yon tan ci yang med kyang /
NK045(bi)004:107: lam rkyen gyis zin na gzod 'gyur rung yin par 'dod na /
NK045(bi)004:108: bden stong med dgag gi ldog cha de 'dus ma
NK045(bi)004:109: byas don byed nus pas stong pa la de 'dra'i
NK045(bi)004:110: khyad par gang yang 'thad pa med de /
NK045(bi)004:111: 'dus byas sa bon gyi cha ni tha snyad du
NK045(bi)004:112: myu gur gnas 'gyur rung gi sa bon gyi steng
NK045(bi)004:113: gi bden med kyi cha ni myu gur gnas 'gyur
NK045(bi)004:114: ba nam yang mi srid pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)004:115: gzhan yang bden stong yin pa'i gnad kyis sangs rgya rung yin par sgrub pa'ang bab bcol te /
NK045(bi)004:116: sems bden grub yin na sangs rgya mi rung ba tsam yin pa bden kyang /
NK045(bi)004:117: bden grub med pa yin na sangs rgya ba'i nges pa med de /
NK045(bi)004:118: sa rdo la sogs pa chos thams cad kyang bden med yin kyang /
NK045(bi)004:119: bden med yin tshad sangs rgya rung bar sus sgrub par nus /
NK045(bi)004:120: bden med la dmigs pas sgrib pa spong nus pa kho nas rigs su 'jog pa'ang gyi na ste /
NK045(bi)004:121: stong pa nyid la dmigs pa kho nas shes sgrib
NK045(bi)004:122: spong ba'i rgyu mtshan med par slar tshogs mtha' yas
NK045(bi)004:123: pas brgyan dgos par khyod rang 'dod bzhin du /
NK045(bi)004:124: med dgag de 'dra la bde gshegs snying po zhes 'dod pa don med de /
NK045(bi)004:125: 'di nyan rang dang thun mongs pa'i rigs su 'gyur gyi /
NK045(bi)004:126: 'dis sangs rgya rung mi 'grub ste 'di tsam la
NK045(bi)004:127: shes sgrib spangs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
NK045(bi)004:128: ye shes 'byung ba'i 'thad pa gang yang sgrub ma
NK045(bi)004:129: nus pa dang / med dgag rang gi ngo bo
NK045(bi)004:130: la mkhyen cha med pas sangs rgyas dus kyang des
NK045(bi)004:131: ci yang mkhyen mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:132: des na gnas gyur 'dus byas kyi rigs kyi tshul 'di yid la mdza' na /
NK045(bi)004:133: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud na thog
NK045(bi)004:134: ma med pa nas yod pa'i mkhyen brtse nus gsum
NK045(bi)004:135: gyi sa bon / gcan gzan dang srin po sogs kyang rang gi bu la brtse ba dang /
NK045(bi)004:136: phan gnod ngo shes pa sogs yod pa de /
NK045(bi)004:137: lam gyis zin nas gegs bral te je 'phel du
NK045(bi)004:138: song ba na tshad med pa'i mkhyen brtse nus gsum
NK045(bi)004:139: mnga' ba sangs rgyas su 'gyur rung ba tsam la
NK045(bi)004:140: 'dod na med dgag la rigs su 'dod pa las
NK045(bi)004:141: de legs te / skyed byed kyi rgyu 'bras yin dgos phan chad /
NK045(bi)004:142: skad cig can dngos por gyur pa'i rgyu skyed byed yin pa bor nas /
NK045(bi)004:143: dngos med 'dus ma byas skyed byed min pa la rgyur 'dod pa ni ya mtshan pa'i gnas so //
NK045(bi)004:144: kha cig 'di snyam du bden med yin tshad rigs
NK045(bi)004:145: ma yin kyang sems kyi rang bzhin bden med kho
NK045(bi)004:146: na rigs su 'thad do snyam nas /
NK045(bi)004:147: sems kyi bden med yin kyang rung des ni skyed pa'i bya ba ci yang mi nus la /
NK045(bi)004:148: chos can sems kyi skad cig ma rnams phyi ma'i
NK045(bi)004:149: skyed byed du 'os pas 'dus ma byas pa'i rigs
NK045(bi)004:150: 'di khyed la mi mkho 'dra bas bor cig /
NK045(bi)004:151: gal te bden gnyis so sor phye nas mi 'jog ste /
NK045(bi)004:152: chos can sems kyi gsal ba dang chos nyid stong
NK045(bi)004:153: pa nyid dbyer med pa'i gnas lugs rigs su 'dod
NK045(bi)004:154: do snyam na / 'di yang rnam shes dang ye
NK045(bi)004:155: shes kyi zlas phye ba'i ye shes 'gyur med 'dus
NK045(bi)004:156: ma byas la 'dod na ni de ltar lung dang
NK045(bi)004:157: rigs pas grub pa'i phyir shin tu yin mod kyi
NK045(bi)004:158: do snyam na / / stong pa dang zung du
NK045(bi)004:159: 'jug rgyu'i chos can de rnam shes skad cig ma'i
NK045(bi)004:160: cha 'di zhe la bzhag nas 'di rim gyis sangs
NK045(bi)004:161: rgyas su go 'apho'o snyam pa ni gyi na ste
NK045(bi)004:162: do snyam na / / / rigs la 'dus byas
NK045(bi)004:163: dang 'dus ma byas kyi cha gnyis yod par thal
NK045(bi)004:164: do snyam na / / / zhing / de lta
NK045(bi)004:165: na dgos nus med pa'i 'dus ma byas ni rigs
NK045(bi)004:167: 'dus byas ni 'bras bu skyed nus kyi rigs mtshan
NK045(bi)004:168: nyid par 'gro bas rang bzhin gnas rigs 'dus ma
NK045(bi)004:169: byas chos kyi dbyings la bzhed pa'i theg chen gyi
NK045(bi)004:170: mdo sde kun gyi dgongs pa stong par zad do
NK045(bi)004:171: // des na bskyed bya skyed byed kyi rgyu 'bras
NK045(bi)004:172: su gyur pa'i sgo nas bzhag pa'i rigs zhig sems
NK045(bi)004:173: kyis 'dor mi nus par chos dbyings rnam dag la
NK045(bi)004:174: rang bzhin gnas rigs su smras kyang zhe 'dod dang
NK045(bi)004:175: rang tshig 'gal ba'i rtags ngoms pa tsam las ma
NK045(bi)004:176: mchis pas chos dbyings 'gyur med la sangs rgyas kyi
NK045(bi)004:178: thog mar chos kyi dbyings zhes pa gang la gdags
NK045(bi)004:179: pa'i gzhi rnam grangs min pa'i don dam bden gnyis
NK045(bi)004:180: zung 'jug chen po rab tu mi gnas pa dbu
NK045(bi)004:181: ma'i don de nyid ngos zin par bya ste /
NK045(bi)004:182: de ngos ma zin par rnam grangs pa'i don dam
NK045(bi)004:183: tsam la 'dod na nags su spre'u'i tshogs mthong ba
NK045(bi)004:184: la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lhar 'khrul pa ltar
NK045(bi)004:185: chos dbyings ma yin pa la chos dbyings su bzung
NK045(bi)004:186: nas de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs su 'dod pa
NK045(bi)004:187: dang / de nyid dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:188: de ngo bo nyid sku'i rgyur 'dod pa sogs rnam
NK045(bi)004:189: gzhag kun theg pa chen po ltar bcos pa'i lam
NK045(bi)004:190: yin par grub cing sher mdo sogs las kyang de
NK045(bi)004:191: ltar gsungs so // de bas na bden gnyis zung
NK045(bi)004:192: 'jug gi dbyings spros pa'i d+r+wa ba kun gyis dben
NK045(bi)004:193: pa'i don so so rang gis rig par bya ba
NK045(bi)004:194: la rang bzhin rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings
NK045(bi)004:195: dang stong pa nyid ces bya ste de ni sangs
NK045(bi)004:196: rgyas kyi rigs mtshan nyid pa dang dag pa gnyis
NK045(bi)004:197: ldan gyi ngo bo nyid skur 'gyur ba yin par
NK045(bi)004:198: theg chen gyi mdo dang dgongs 'grel thams cad las
NK045(bi)004:199: ltar gsungs so // gsungs pas na / rang bzhin
NK045(bi)004:200: gnas rigs 'di 'dus ma byas su 'dod pa las
NK045(bi)004:202: 'dus ma byas yin phan chod 'di rang gi ngo
NK045(bi)004:203: bo nyid kyis 'bras bu gzhan bskyed nas rang nyid
NK045(bi)004:204: 'gag pa'i bya ba byed pa mi 'thad pa'i chos
NK045(bi)004:205: sku'i yon tan rnams kyang bral 'bras su khas len
NK045(bi)004:207: de ltar yin par rgyal tshab sa bcu'i sems dpa' chen pos rgyud bla ma las gsungs pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:208: dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis chos dbyings bstod
NK045(bi)004:209: pa las kyang gsal por gsungs pa'i phyir gzhung de
NK045(bi)004:210: dag gi rjes su 'brangs nas rang lugs chos dbyings
NK045(bi)004:211: 'dus ma byas pa rigs su 'dod cing /
NK045(bi)004:212: dbyings de nyid chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs yin la de'i ngo bo skye 'gag med pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:213: snang stong dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid du gnas kyi phyogs su lhung ba med pa yin no //
NK045(bi)004:214: 'di ltar skye zhing 'gag bar snang ba'i 'dus byas
NK045(bi)004:215: rnams ni snang ba ltar ma grub pa'i phyir dbyings
NK045(bi)004:216: kyi gshis la des gos pa yod ma myong bas
NK045(bi)004:217: / 'khor ba rgyu 'bras ye nas dag cing rang
NK045(bi)004:218: bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i 'od gsal zag med kyi
NK045(bi)004:219: snang ba rnams dang 'du 'bral med pa'i gnad 'dis
NK045(bi)004:220: bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshul phyin ci ma
NK045(bi)004:221: log pa ngos zin par bya dgos so //
NK045(bi)004:222: de bas na gnyis pa rang lugs brjod pa la /
NK045(bi)004:223: gong gi rkang pa dang po'i don ni /
NK045(bi)004:224: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku mthar
NK045(bi)004:225: thug pa chos kyi sku yon tan nam mkha' dang
NK045(bi)004:227: sngon tha mal ba 'ching pa kun ldan du gyur
NK045(bi)004:228: pa'i gang zag gi rgyud de las phyis gsal ba'am
NK045(bi)004:230: mngon du gyur pa yod pas na da lta nas
NK045(bi)004:231: sems can gyi rgyud na bde gshegs snying po yod
NK045(bi)004:234: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa gnyis su yod de /
NK045(bi)004:235: dang po ye shes chos sku mngon du mdzad pa'i
NK045(bi)004:236: sems can yod na sems la sangs rgya rung gi
NK045(bi)004:238: rigs gtan med pa la de ltar mi 'thad pa'i phyir te /
NK045(bi)004:240: khams yod na ni las byas pas //
NK045(bi)004:241: sa le sbram dag mthong bar 'gyur //
NK045(bi)004:242: khams med pa na las byas kyang //
NK045(bi)004:243: nyon mongs 'ba' zhig skye bar zad //
NK045(bi)004:245: gnyis pa de ltar 'thad pa bstan pa dpe zhing
NK045(bi)004:246: sa la lo tog skye rung ltar sems 'di sangs
NK045(bi)004:247: rgya rung gi rgyu tsam du grub kyang /
NK045(bi)004:248: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ye ldan gyi rigs khyad par ba ji ltar 'grub snyam na /
NK045(bi)004:249: de yang 'grub ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
NK045(bi)004:250: ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i bdag
NK045(bi)004:251: nyid ye shes kyi sku can te /
NK045(bi)004:252: 'dus byas mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin can min par lung dang rigs pas grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:253: de yang lung ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:254: dge slong tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa la /
NK045(bi)004:255: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin no zhes zer
NK045(bi)004:256: bas ni mu stegs par gyur te shi yang sla'o
NK045(bi)004:259: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku dang /
NK045(bi)004:262: sha'i sku ma yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:266: de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag go zhes bya ba'i
NK045(bi)004:267: tshig smra bas ni shing gi phung po 'bar pa
NK045(bi)004:268: 'di la lces kun nas reg par byas te shi
NK045(bi)004:269: yang sla'i / tshig de ni mnyan par mi bya'o //
NK045(bi)004:271: med dgag gi cha tsam myang 'das su mi rung ba yang lung de las /
NK045(bi)004:272: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni
NK045(bi)004:273: gang gi tshe btsal kyang ci yang ma rnyed pa
NK045(bi)004:274: ste / ci yang med pa zhes bya ba ni gcer bu ba rnams la'ang yod mod kyi /
NK045(bi)004:275: thar pa ni de lta ma yin no //
NK045(bi)004:277: thar pa gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i khams yin te /
NK045(bi)004:278: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
NK045(bi)004:280: rdo rje gcod pa las kyang /
NK045(bi)004:281: gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong //
NK045(bi)004:282: gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa //
NK045(bi)004:283: log pa'i lam du zhugs pa ste //
NK045(bi)004:284: skye bo de dag nga mi mthong //
NK045(bi)004:285: sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid lta //
NK045(bi)004:286: 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku //
NK045(bi)004:287: chos nyid shes par bya min pas //
NK045(bi)004:288: de ni rnam par shes mi nus //
NK045(bi)004:289: zhes gsungs pa la sogs pas mtshon te nges don
NK045(bi)004:290: gyi mdo ste kun las rgya cher bstan pa dang
NK045(bi)004:292: gdod ma'i chos dbyings dang gnyis su med par ro
NK045(bi)004:293: mnyam pa'i 'bras bu mthar thug pa rnam mkhyen gyi
NK045(bi)004:294: ye shes nyid rgyu rkyen gyis gsar du 'dus byas
NK045(bi)004:295: pa'i mi rtag pa yin na /
NK045(bi)004:296: rang byung gi ye shes ma yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:297: 'gyur ba'i zug rngu ma spangs pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:298: yang 'gags yang skye ba'i cha dang bcas pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:299: rang gi ngo bos 'jig pas bslu ba can dang /
NK045(bi)004:300: gtan gyi skyabs su ma gyur pa rang nyid skyes ma thag tu 'gags pa'i phyir dang /
NK045(bi)004:301: rgyu'i tshogs pa tshang ba gang du nyi tshe bar gnas pa'i phyir dang /
NK045(bi)004:302: chos kun la ro mnyam du ma song ba dang /
NK045(bi)004:303: mtha' kun las ma 'das pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:304: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi skye ba sogs ma 'gags pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:305: rang dbang med par 'du byed pa'i gzhan dbang can
NK045(bi)004:306: du thal ba sogs kyi skyon dang bcas pas de
NK045(bi)004:307: ltar khas len pa la rdo rje'i sku la mi
NK045(bi)004:308: rtag par blta ba'i nyes pa shin tu rgya cher
NK045(bi)004:309: 'byung bas na / lam ngan pa 'di dor nas
NK045(bi)004:310: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi sku ni 'dus
NK045(bi)004:311: ma byas dang rtag pa dam pa blta bar bya
NK045(bi)004:312: 'byung bas na / ste / thun mong tshu rol
NK045(bi)004:313: mthong ba la brten pa'i rigs pa tsam gyis gzhal
NK045(bi)004:314: nas ye shes 'dus ma byas pa mi srid de
NK045(bi)004:315: 'byung bas na / ste / / shes pa dang
NK045(bi)004:316: rtag pa'i gzhi mthun mi srid pas so snyam pa
NK045(bi)004:318: yul shes pa'i shes pa nyi tshe pa la mi rtag pas khyab kyang /
NK045(bi)004:319: shes dang shes bya ro gcig pa'i ye shes mkha'
NK045(bi)004:320: khyab mkha' yi rdo rje can ni de dang mi
NK045(bi)004:321: 'dra ste / 'dus ma byas pa'i rang gdangs 'od
NK045(bi)004:322: gsal mi 'gyur ba'i ngang der 'khor 'das kyi chos
NK045(bi)004:323: kun 'ub chub pas na de'i ngo bo la skye
NK045(bi)004:324: 'gags ye nas med par mthar thug dpyod pa'i rig
NK045(bi)004:325: shes kyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:326: des na de 'dra ba'i ye shes de ni 'dus
NK045(bi)004:327: byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' gang la'ang mi
NK045(bi)004:328: gnas pa'i 'dus ma byas chen po ste /
NK045(bi)004:329: dngos med rkyang pa dang gtan mi 'dra la /
NK045(bi)004:330: dngos dngos med gnyis ka chos can yin zhing /
NK045(bi)004:331: de dag brten nas skyes pa'am brten nas btags pa'i
NK045(bi)004:332: phyir na yang dag par dpyad na 'dus byas dang
NK045(bi)004:333: gsog gsob rdzun pa bslu ba yin la /
NK045(bi)004:334: bde gshegs snying po ni dngos dngos med kyi chos
NK045(bi)004:335: kun gyi chos nyid 'dus ma byas chen po yang
NK045(bi)004:336: dag par mi bslu ba yin te /
NK045(bi)004:338: rang bzhin dag ni bcos min dang //
NK045(bi)004:339: gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin //
NK045(bi)004:341: dngos dang dngos med 'dus byas yin /
NK045(bi)004:344: de ltar mthar thug chos sku'i ye shes de ni
NK045(bi)004:345: srid zhi kun khyab dang mnyam pa nyid dang 'dus
NK045(bi)004:347: 'gyur med don dam pa'i rang bzhin du nges pa
NK045(bi)004:348: don gyi mdo sde'i lung dang mthar thug dpyod pa'i
NK045(bi)004:350: de nam zhig mngon du 'gyur rung gi rgyud na
NK045(bi)004:351: da lta nas ye shes chos sku'i rang bzhin chos
NK045(bi)004:352: nyid kyi tshul du bri gang dang bral bar bzhugs
NK045(bi)004:354: glo bur gyi dri ma bral ma bral gyi snang tshul la mngon du gyur ma gyur yod kyang /
NK045(bi)004:355: gnas tshul la snga phyir bzang ngan gyi khyad par til tsam med de /
NK045(bi)004:356: 'gyur med 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te /
NK045(bi)004:358: ji ltar sngar bzhin phyis de bzhin /
NK045(bi)004:359: 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid do //
NK045(bi)004:361: sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin pa //
NK045(bi)004:362: de ni nam mkha' bzhin du 'gyur med de //
NK045(bi)004:363: yang dag min rtog las byung 'dod chags sogs //
NK045(bi)004:364: glo bur dri mas de nyon mongs mi 'gyur //
NK045(bi)004:365: zhes sogs 'khor ba'i chos thams cad 'gyur zhing mi
NK045(bi)004:366: brtan pa yin la de kun chos nyid de'i ngang
NK045(bi)004:367: du 'pho 'gyur byed pa ltar snang yang /
NK045(bi)004:368: sems kyi dag pa bde gshegs snying po ni nam
NK045(bi)004:369: mkha' ltar 'pho 'gyur med par yang nas yang du
NK045(bi)004:370: gsungs pa ltar shes par bya la /
NK045(bi)004:371: de ltar 'dus ma byas 'od gsal ba'i dbyings la
NK045(bi)004:372: 'khrul pas gos pa med par rang bzhin gyis rnam
NK045(bi)004:373: par dag cing / ma 'khrul pa gshis kyi rang
NK045(bi)004:374: gdangs la lhun gyis grub pa'i stobs sogs 'bras chos
NK045(bi)004:375: kyi yon tan 'bral med du gnas te nyi ma
NK045(bi)004:377: de ltar yang rgyud bla ma las /
NK045(bi)004:378: rnam dbyer bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can //
NK045(bi)004:379: glo bur dag gis khams stong gi //
NK045(bi)004:380: rnam dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can //
NK045(bi)004:381: bla med chos kyis stong ma yin //
NK045(bi)004:382: zhes 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad ni nga dang
NK045(bi)004:383: chos kyi bdag tu 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i sems las
NK045(bi)004:384: byung la / 'khrul sems de yang gdod ma'i gshis
NK045(bi)004:385: 'od gsal la ye nas ma gos ma 'dres par
NK045(bi)004:386: mkha' la sprin ltar glo bur ba yin pas skyon
NK045(bi)004:387: de dag ni khams dang so sor 'byed cing 'bral
NK045(bi)004:388: rung ba yin pas khams kyi ngo bo la skyon
NK045(bi)004:389: des stong pa ste ma gos pa yin la /
NK045(bi)004:390: 'khrul pas bslad pa la mi ltos par rang gi
NK045(bi)004:391: ngang gis 'od gsal zhing chos kun gyi de kho
NK045(bi)004:392: na nyid du zhugs pa'i rang byung gi ye shes
NK045(bi)004:393: las rnam dbyer byar med pa'i mthar thug gi yon
NK045(bi)004:394: tan rnams kyi khams de mi stong ste /
NK045(bi)004:395: rang gi ngo bo la 'bral med kyi gshis yin pas nyi ma dang zer bzhin no //
NK045(bi)004:396: de ltar rang bzhin gnas rigs de 'dus ma byas
NK045(bi)004:397: pa yon tan ye ldan chos sku'i ngo bor grub
NK045(bi)004:398: pa na sangs rgya rung bas sems can thams cad
NK045(bi)004:399: kyi rgyud na ye shes chos sku bri gang dang
NK045(bi)004:401: lam bsgoms na sangs rgya rung bar dngos stobs kyis grub la /
NK045(bi)004:402: sangs rgyas dus kyi chos sku de 'dus ma byas
NK045(bi)004:403: yin pas gsar du rgyu rkyen gyis 'dus byas pa
NK045(bi)004:404: mi srid pa'i phyir da lta nas sangs rgyas kyii
NK045(bi)004:405: ngo bor bzhugs zhes grub bo //
NK045(bi)004:406: de la kha cig 'di snyam du da lta nas
NK045(bi)004:407: sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bor bzhugs na rnam pa thams
NK045(bi)004:408: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes des sems can de dag
NK045(bi)004:409: gi sgrib pa ci la mi sel snyam pa dang
NK045(bi)004:410: / yang theg pa thun mong pa'i go yul la
NK045(bi)004:411: zhen nas sangs rgyas ni 'bras bu dang sems can
NK045(bi)004:412: rgyu yin pas rgyu la 'bras bu yod na zan
NK045(bi)004:413: za mi gtsang za ba'i rigs pa sogs kyis gnod
NK045(bi)004:414: / do snyam na / shin tu zab pa'i nges
NK045(bi)004:415: don gyi mdo sde'i don la blo ma sbyangs pa
NK045(bi)004:416: khyod la thun mong pa'i gzhung gi go ba tsam
NK045(bi)004:417: gyis khrid nas dogs pa da ltar skye ba la
NK045(bi)004:418: / do snyam na / khags med kyang / de
NK045(bi)004:419: ma yin te chos nyid 'od gsal ba'i ye shes
NK045(bi)004:420: kun la khyad med par yod kyang /
NK045(bi)004:421: rang sems 'khrul pa glo bur ba 'di skyes pa'i
NK045(bi)004:422: tshe 'khrul sems yul dang bcas pa 'di tsam 'khor
NK045(bi)004:423: ba'i gdags gzhi yin la 'khrul pa des rang la
NK045(bi)004:424: yod pa'i chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du mi
NK045(bi)004:425: shes te / dper na gnyid kyi dus na yid
NK045(bi)004:426: kyi shes pa gcig pu'i dbang gis lus dang yul
NK045(bi)004:427: dang mig shes la sogs pa'i snang ba mu med
NK045(bi)004:429: de dus yul yul can so sor 'dzin cing dmigs kyi /
NK045(bi)004:430: yid shes kho rang gis rang gi yin lugs gzung
NK045(bi)004:431: 'dzin tha dad du ma grub pa shes mi nus
NK045(bi)004:432: la / ma shes kyang yin lugs de las gzhan du gyur pa med pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:433: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gnas kyang de
NK045(bi)004:434: ltar yin pa tsam gyis kun gyis rtogs dgos pa
NK045(bi)004:436: gnas snang mi mthun pa'i 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:437: des na sems dang snying po'i ye shes gnyis chos
NK045(bi)004:438: can dang chos nyid yin la sangs rgyas dang sems
NK045(bi)004:439: can kyang gnas tshul dang snang tshul gyi dbang du
NK045(bi)004:440: byas nas ston pa'i phyir rgyu la 'bras gnas kyi
NK045(bi)004:441: rigs pa'i gnod pa ston pa ni phyogs ma go
NK045(bi)004:442: bar zad do // de ltar rigs pa 'di ni
NK045(bi)004:443: 'bras dus kyi chos sku mngon du gsal ba'i rtags
NK045(bi)004:444: kyis rgyu dus kyi rigs yon tan ye ldan can
NK045(bi)004:446: gnas tshul la snga phyi rgyu 'bras su med kyang
NK045(bi)004:447: snang tshul la ltos nas rgyu 'bras su bzhag dgos
NK045(bi)004:448: pa'i phyir 'bras bu las rgyu bsgrub pa ltos pa'i
NK045(bi)004:449: rigs pa zhes bya ba yin no //
NK045(bi)004:451: de bzhin nyid dbyer med phyir dang /
NK045(bi)004:453: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad gnas lugs stong pa
NK045(bi)004:454: nyid gdod ma'i 'od gsal chen por dbyer med ro
NK045(bi)004:455: gcig pas na / sangs rgyas dang sems can kyang
NK045(bi)004:456: don dam par dbye ba med de srid zhi mnyam
NK045(bi)004:457: gcig pas na / pa nyid do // de'i phyir
NK045(bi)004:458: 'khrul pa glo bur bas sprul pa'i sems can ltar
NK045(bi)004:459: snang ba rnams kyang gnas lugs don dam pa'i chos
NK045(bi)004:460: nyid las cung zad kyang ma g.yos par chos nyid
NK045(bi)004:461: kyi rigs pas grub pas na sangs rgyas kyi snying
NK045(bi)004:463: mdo las kyang chos thams cad gdod ma nas 'od gsal ba dang /
NK045(bi)004:464: mya ngan las 'das pa dang mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa yin no //
NK045(bi)004:465: 'o na khyod kyis sngar gzhan la brjod pa ltar
NK045(bi)004:466: de bzhin nyid du dbyer med pa tsam gyis rigs
NK045(bi)004:468: sa rdo sogs la'ang rigs yod par thal lo snyam na /
NK045(bi)004:469: rigs zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa'i sems kyi dbang
NK045(bi)004:470: gis 'byung ba'i sgrib gnyis zad par spangs nas shes
NK045(bi)004:471: bya'i rang bzhin la ma 'khrul pa'i blo rgyas pa'i
NK045(bi)004:472: sangs rgyas kyi rgyu skyon med la 'jog dgos na
NK045(bi)004:473: / de sems ma yin pa sa rdo sogs bem
NK045(bi)004:474: po la lam sgrub pa med pas tha snyad du
NK045(bi)004:475: de bzhin nyid du dbyer med na'ang de la rigs
NK045(bi)004:477: sems kyi dbang gis sa rdo sogs snang gi /
NK045(bi)004:478: sa rdo sogs phyi rol gyi dbang gis sems byung ba ma yin pa /
NK045(bi)004:479: rmi lam gyi snang ba dang de dus kyi shes pa'i dpes mtshon te shes par bya la /
NK045(bi)004:480: khams gsum gyi byed pa po sems 'di la chos
NK045(bi)004:481: nyid bde gshegs snying po don dam pa'i dge ba
NK045(bi)004:482: zag med kyi rang bzhin can nyid /
NK045(bi)004:483: chu la rlan ltar bzhugs par shes pas 'khor 'das
NK045(bi)004:484: kyi snang ba rnams ni rnam shes dang ye shes
NK045(bi)004:485: de dag gi rol pa tsam yin pas tha dad
NK045(bi)004:487: yang dag pa'i don du chos nyid ye sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)004:488: pa'i ngang las ma g.yos pa'i snang ba thams cad
NK045(bi)004:489: kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngang tshul las mi 'da'
NK045(bi)004:490: bar shin tu yang khas len te /
NK045(bi)004:492: gzugs kyi dag pa 'bras bu dag par rig par bya //
NK045(bi)004:493: 'bras bu gzugs dag thams cad mkhyen nyid dag par 'gyur //
NK045(bi)004:494: thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag dang gzugs dag pa //
NK045(bi)004:495: nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te dbyer med bcad du med //
NK045(bi)004:497: yul can sgrib pa las grol ba'i dag pa gang yin pa /
NK045(bi)004:498: yul gzugs la sogs pa'i dag pa'am rang bzhin yin te /
NK045(bi)004:499: rang snang gi sgrib pa rim bral gyi mthong tshul
NK045(bi)004:500: tsam las don gyi ngo bo ye nas sgrib bral
NK045(bi)004:502: des na yul can rig pa'i khams kyi dri ma zad de sangs rgyas pa na /
NK045(bi)004:503: yul gyi dngos pos dag par lhag mar mi lus te /
NK045(bi)004:504: mig skyon dag na rab rib rang sangs pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)004:505: 'o na gcig sangs rgyas dus snang ba ma dag pa kun 'gag go snyam na ma yin te /
NK045(bi)004:506: gang zag so so'i rang snang gi sgrib pas rang
NK045(bi)004:507: bsgribs nas gnas snang 'gal bar mthong ba yod pa'i
NK045(bi)004:508: phyir ro // 'o na gnas snang rnam pa kun
NK045(bi)004:509: tu mthun pa sangs rgyas kyi sa na ma dag
NK045(bi)004:510: pa'i snang ba 'di kun mnga' 'am mi mnga' /
NK045(bi)004:511: mnga' na chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas la /
NK045(bi)004:512: mi mnga' na kun tu 'gro ba'i lam la sogs pa mkhyen par mi srid do snyam na /
NK045(bi)004:513: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'khor
NK045(bi)004:514: 'das kyi chos srid do cog kun rang dang ro
NK045(bi)004:515: mnyam pa'i ngang nas 'bad med lhun grub tu mkhyen
NK045(bi)004:516: cing / de la rang ngor thams cad dag pa
NK045(bi)004:517: chen por gzigs pa las ma 'das bzhin du 'gro
NK045(bi)004:518: ba rigs drug gi snang ba rnams kyang so so'i
NK045(bi)004:519: snang tshul ltar gzigs pa 'di ni /
NK045(bi)004:520: yul dang yul can gyi gnyis snang gi sgrib pa
NK045(bi)004:521: mtha' dag zad pa'i stobs kyis chos can ji snyed
NK045(bi)004:522: pa ma 'dres yongs rdzogs kyi tshul du chos nyid
NK045(bi)004:523: kyi klong du chud pa'i gnad kyis ro mnyam pa'i
NK045(bi)004:524: ye shes skye 'gag dang bral bas cig char gzigs
NK045(bi)004:525: pa ste / tshul mthong gis lta ci /
NK045(bi)004:526: sa la gnas pas kyang bsam par dka' ba'o //
NK045(bi)004:527: de'i tshul kyang ji skad du byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las /
NK045(bi)004:528: chos kun mnyam pa nyid mnyam par //
NK045(bi)004:529: rang byung pas ni rjes su rtogs //
NK045(bi)004:530: de phyir yang dag mngon sangs rgyas //
NK045(bi)004:531: de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa mnyam //
NK045(bi)004:533: sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de bzhin du
NK045(bi)004:534: shes pas de de'i phyir sems kyi skad cig gcig
NK045(bi)004:535: dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa
NK045(bi)004:536: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
NK045(bi)004:537: par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya'o //
NK045(bi)004:538: zhes gsungs pa ltar slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal nas /
NK045(bi)004:539: ji ltar snod kyi dbye bas mkha' la dbye ba med de ltar //
NK045(bi)004:540: dngos byas dbye ba 'ga' yang de nyid la med de yi phyir //
NK045(bi)004:541: ro mnyam nyid du yang dag thugs su chud par mdzad gyur na //
NK045(bi)004:542: mkhyen bzang khyod kyis skad cig gis ni shes bya thugs su chud //
NK045(bi)004:543: ces gsungs pa ltar dbyings dang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen pos /
NK045(bi)004:544: chos thams cad khyab cing 'bad med gzigs pa rgya
NK045(bi)004:545: mtsho la zla skar shar ba'i tshul du khyab cing
NK045(bi)004:546: rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i ngang nas gzigs pa
NK045(bi)004:547: 'di rang byung 'od gsal ba'i ye shes gzhi la
NK045(bi)004:548: bzhugs pa'i chos nyid de sgrib pa mtha' dag zad
NK045(bi)004:549: nas ji bzhin mngon du gyur pa'i stobs kyis yin
NK045(bi)004:550: pas mthar thug dpyod pa'i chos nyid kyi rigs pa
NK045(bi)004:551: yang dag la brten na mi ldog pa'i yid ches
NK045(bi)004:553: gzhan du nyi tshe ba'i blos gzhal nas sangs rgyas kyi sa na ye shes med pa'am /
NK045(bi)004:554: yod kyang 'gyur bcas kyi blo tha mal pa dang mtshungs par sgrub pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:555: sems can gyi khams mi gzigs pa'am yang na ma dag pa'i snang ba yod par 'dod pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:556: ji lta ji snyed ngo bo ro mnyam du sgrub
NK045(bi)004:557: ma nus pa sogs 'gal 'du dang kun rtog gi
NK045(bi)004:558: rnyogs ma mang du slong ba mthong ngo //
NK045(bi)004:559: rkang pa gsum pa rigs yod phyir na /
NK045(bi)004:561: sems can thams cad la sangs rgya rung gi rigs yod de /
NK045(bi)004:562: dri ma glo bur ba spang rung du grub cing /
NK045(bi)004:563: yon tan ye ldan gyi chos sku kun la khyad med par yod par grub pas so //
NK045(bi)004:564: de ltar sangs rgya rung gi rigs yod na lus
NK045(bi)004:565: can de dag sangs rgyas kyi snying po can du
NK045(bi)004:566: nges te / de dag sangs rgyas pa'i gnas skabs yod la /
NK045(bi)004:567: sangs rgyas chos sku de yang ngo bo 'dus ma
NK045(bi)004:568: byas su grub pas snga phyi la bzang ngan gyi
NK045(bi)004:569: khyad par ngo bo'i cha nas med pa'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)004:570: // rigs pa gsum pa 'dis rgyu las 'bras bu
NK045(bi)004:571: skyed par shes pa bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa
NK045(bi)004:572: // yin no // 'dir rgyu yod tsam gyis 'bras bu 'byin par dpog pa tsam min te /
NK045(bi)004:573: chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi rigs la 'gyur ba med pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:574: de 'bras dus ngo bo la bzang ngan med pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:575: glo bur pa'i dri ma rnams yun ji ltar ring
NK045(bi)004:576: yang 'bral rung yin pas rigs de sangs rgyal ba
NK045(bi)004:577: la nam yang chud za ba mi srid pa'i gnad
NK045(bi)004:578: kyis so // de ltar rgyu rigs yod pa de
NK045(bi)004:579: 'bras dus kyi chos sku dang ngo bo khyad med
NK045(bi)004:580: kyis so // dang / 'bras dus kyi chos sku
NK045(bi)004:581: yod na de sems can gyi dus na'ang 'phel 'bri
NK045(bi)004:582: med par yod dgos pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:583: rgyu 'bras dang snga phyir btags kyang don la chos
NK045(bi)004:584: dbyings 'gyur med kyi ngo bor ro gcig pa'i rigs
NK045(bi)004:585: pa de gsum gyis sems can thams cad de bzhin
NK045(bi)004:586: gshegs pa'i snying po can du 'grub ste dngos po'i
NK045(bi)004:587: stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rigs pa yang dag gi lam
NK045(bi)004:588: nas so // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
NK045(bi)004:589: po sems can thams cad la yod par sgrub pa'i
NK045(bi)004:590: rigs pa 'dis mthar thug gi thar pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:591: de bzhin gshegs pa dang chos thams cad kyi gnas
NK045(bi)004:592: lugs don dam pa rnams tha dad du med la
NK045(bi)004:593: / de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid
NK045(bi)004:594: kyi stobs las byung bar shes na mthar thug theg
NK045(bi)004:596: gzhan du bde gshegs snying po zhes pa sems can gyi khams na med pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:597: sangs rgyas kyi dus na med pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:598: rgyu dus yon tan med pa la 'bras dus gsar
NK045(bi)004:599: du yon tan can du smra ba sogs theg pa
NK045(bi)004:600: chen po'i don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dag gi
NK045(bi)004:601: lugs la mthar thug theg gcig sgrub pa'i rigs pa
NK045(bi)004:603: de'i phyir theg pa mchog gi gnas la mos pa
NK045(bi)004:604: rnams kyis gnas 'di la shin tu blo gros 'byor
NK045(bi)004:606: de ltar sems can gyi dus na yon tan ye
NK045(bi)004:607: ldan gyi khams yod par bzhag pa de ni bsam
NK045(bi)004:608: gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas zab mo yin pas sangs
NK045(bi)004:609: rgyas kyis kyang 'khor rnams la de'i gsung gis yid
NK045(bi)004:610: ches par gyis dang mi bslu bar 'gyur gyi rang
NK045(bi)004:611: stobs kyis shes par dka' ba'i tshul gyis bka' stsal
NK045(bi)004:612: pas zab mo'i mthar thug tu bstan pa yin pas
NK045(bi)004:613: / 'di la blo chung rtog ge rnams rgol ba brgyud mar byed de /
NK045(bi)004:614: sangs rgyas dang sems can gyi gzhi mthun gyi sems
NK045(bi)004:615: yod par thal ba sogs tha snyad la brten pa'i
NK045(bi)004:616: klan ka ji snyed pa ni gyi nar smra ba
NK045(bi)004:617: ste / ji skad du dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:618: 'du byed khams dang don dam mtshan nyid ni //
NK045(bi)004:619: gcig dang tha dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid de //
NK045(bi)004:620: gcig dang tha dad du yang gang rtogs pa //
NK045(bi)004:621: de dag tshul bzhin ma yin zhugs pa yin //
NK045(bi)004:623: sems kyi chos nyid snying po'i khams dang /
NK045(bi)004:624: chos can gyi sems gnyis gcig tha dad gang du'ang khas blang mi dgos la /
NK045(bi)004:625: gnas tshul chos nyid kyi don las ma 'das kyang /
NK045(bi)004:626: snang tshul 'khrul pa srid pa la 'gal pa med par ma zad /
NK045(bi)004:627: de las gzhan du thar pa med pa'am /
NK045(bi)004:628: su yang 'khrul mi srid pa sogs kyi skyon du 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)004:629: gnas snang mi mthun pa yod pa'i phyir 'khrul ba'i sems can srid cing /
NK045(bi)004:630: de lam la zhugs pas 'khrul pa spangs nas sangs rgyas pa'ang yod par 'grub pa yin no //
NK045(bi)004:631: don dam dpyod pa'i rigs pas chos thams cad stong
NK045(bi)004:632: pa nyid du grub kyang des snying po'i yon tan
NK045(bi)004:633: 'gog par mii 'gyur te yon tan bla na med
NK045(bi)004:634: pa yod kyang ngo bo stong par 'di pas kyang
NK045(bi)004:635: zhal gyis bzhes pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:636: des na 'khor lo bar pas bstan don kun byang
NK045(bi)004:637: gi chos thams cad stong par bstan pa ni de
NK045(bi)004:638: de bzhin du grub ste bde gshegs snying po'ang stong
NK045(bi)004:639: pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:640: 'on kyang stong pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sku dang
NK045(bi)004:641: ye shes kyi snang ba dang 'du 'bral med pas
NK045(bi)004:642: khyad par du byas pa'i snying po bstan pa 'di
NK045(bi)004:643: 'khor lo tha ma'i nges don gyi mdo sde rnams
NK045(bi)004:645: tshul de tsam gyi cha nas 'khor lo bar pa las lhag pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)004:646: mdo sde dgongs 'grel las 'khor lo tha ma'i don
NK045(bi)004:647: la mchog tu basngagasa pa'ang 'khor lo tha mar gtogs
NK045(bi)004:648: tshad ma yin gyi snying po bstan pa'i nges don
NK045(bi)004:649: gyi phyogs nas de ltar gsungs pa ste /
NK045(bi)004:650: rig khams nor bu sbyong ba'i dpe bstan pa sogs
NK045(bi)004:651: mdo gzhan gyis de ltar gsal bar nges nus so
NK045(bi)004:652: // des na 'khor lo bar par bstan pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
NK045(bi)004:653: tha mar bstan pa'i sku dang ye shes dag snang stong zung du chud par bya dgos pas /
NK045(bi)004:654: 'khor lo bar pa dang tha ma'i nges don gyi
NK045(bi)004:655: skor rnams dbye gsal med par gnyis ka nges don
NK045(bi)004:656: du kun mkhyen klong chen rab 'byams kyis bzhed pa
NK045(bi)004:657: 'di kho na ltar gzung bar bya ste /
NK045(bi)004:658: de gnyis gcig nges don byas na gcig drang don bya dgos pa'i 'gal ba med par ma zad /
NK045(bi)004:659: zung du tshogs par byas nas bde gshegs snying po
NK045(bi)004:660: de lta bu la rgyu rgyud kyi don du byas
NK045(bi)004:661: nas rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag gi gnad 'byung
NK045(bi)004:662: bas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa de dag gnad gcig
NK045(bi)004:664: mthar thug gi don 'di la klu thogs rnam gnyis
NK045(bi)004:665: sogs 'phags pa rnams dgongs pa gcig ste chos dbyings
NK045(bi)004:666: bstod pa dang sems 'grel la sogs pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:667: rgyud bla ma'i 'grel pa sogs kyis gsal bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:668: de ltar yang slob dpon klu sgrub kyis /
NK045(bi)004:669: stong pa nyid ni ston pa'i mdo /
NK045(bi)004:670: rgyal bas ji snyed gsungs pa ste /
NK045(bi)004:671: de dag kun gyis nyon mongs ldog /
NK045(bi)004:672: khams de nyams par byed ma yin /
NK045(bi)004:673: zhes gsungs pa ltar don dam dpyod pas dpyad nas
NK045(bi)004:674: grub 'bras mthar thug bden pa dbyer med rdo rje
NK045(bi)004:675: lta bu'i don / rtog ge'i shes pas mi phyed
NK045(bi)004:676: pa'i dbyings yin pas don dam pa la brten pa'i
NK045(bi)004:677: klan ka 'jug pa'i gzhi med do //
NK045(bi)004:678: da ni khams de dag sems can gyi rgyud na ji ltar bzhugs pa'i tshul bshad na /
NK045(bi)004:679: gnas lugs rang gi ngo bo'i dbang du byas na
NK045(bi)004:680: chos thams cad chos nyid de yi klong du chud
NK045(bi)004:681: cing chos nyid rang gi ngo bo la skye 'gag
NK045(bi)004:682: med par mnyam pa nyid du gnas la 'khor 'das
NK045(bi)004:683: la sogs pa'i bzang ngan dang /
NK045(bi)004:684: pha rol tshu rol bdag dang gzhan che dang chung ba sogs kyi cha dang /
NK045(bi)004:685: snga phyi'i dus kyi khyad par sogs med de chos dbyings thig le nyag gcig 'pho 'gyur med pa'o //
NK045(bi)004:686: gnas lugs la de ltar yin kyang 'khrul pa glo
NK045(bi)004:687: bur pa'i snang ngo dang bstun na 'di ltar khams
NK045(bi)004:688: gsum 'khor ba'i lus sems yul gyi snang bar shar
NK045(bi)004:689: nas chos nyid kyi rang bzhin mi mthong ba'i tshe
NK045(bi)004:690: na'ang / chos nyid ni med pa ma yin te
NK045(bi)004:691: rang gi rang bzhin las g.yo ba cung zad kyang
NK045(bi)004:693: sems kyi chos nyid de lta bu glo bur gyi
NK045(bi)004:694: dri mas sbubs su byas nas mi mngon yang bcud
NK045(bi)004:695: dam dbus na snying po'i tshul gyis gnas pa la
NK045(bi)004:696: rigs sam snying po zhes brjod de /
NK045(bi)004:697: dper na sa 'og gi gter la sogs pa'i dpe dgus mtshon nas shes par bya bar gsungs so //
NK045(bi)004:698: de glo bur gyi dri ma la ltos nas ma dag pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:699: dag ma dag ci rigs pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:700: shin tu rnam dag gi gnas skabs gsum du bzhag
NK045(bi)004:701: kyang khams rang gi ngo bo la khyad par med
NK045(bi)004:703: sangs rgyas ye shes sems can tshogs zhugs phyir //
NK045(bi)004:704: rang bzhin dri med de ni gnyis med de //
NK045(bi)004:705: sangs rgyas rigs la de 'bras nyer btags pas //
NK045(bi)004:706: 'gro kun sangs rgyas snying po can du gsungs //
NK045(bi)004:708: 'di yang rang bzhin chos sku dang /
NK045(bi)004:709: de bzhin nyid dang rigs kyang ste //
NK045(bi)004:711: ma dag ma dag dag pa dang //
NK045(bi)004:712: shin tu rnam dag go rim bzhin //
NK045(bi)004:713: sems can byang chub sems dpa' dang //
NK045(bi)004:714: de bzhin gshegs zhes mtshan gsol lo //
NK045(bi)004:716: de ltar ma shes par bde gshegs snying po zhes
NK045(bi)004:717: pa mkhar gzhong la rgya shug brten pa ltar phung
NK045(bi)004:718: lnga'i gzeb ga shed na 'khrul dang ma 'khrul blo
NK045(bi)004:719: gnyis snang mun bzhin du 'grogs pa zhig gi rnam
NK045(bi)004:720: pa yid la bzung nas dgag sgrub kyang de dang
NK045(bi)004:721: 'tshams par byed pa ni theg chen gyi dgongs don
NK045(bi)004:722: la rang nyid phyogs su ma phyin pa'i 'o dod
NK045(bi)004:724: de bas na theg chen la blo ma sbyangs pa'i
NK045(bi)004:725: rtog ge ngan pa'i khrod snying po'i gtam 'di bsgrags
NK045(bi)004:727: zab mo'i gtam 'di lta bu byis pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:728: mu stegs can la bstan bya ma yin te /
NK045(bi)004:729: de dag chos zab mo 'di mnyan pa'i snod du
NK045(bi)004:730: mi rung bas na de la bdag med pa dang
NK045(bi)004:731: / mi rtag pa sogs las brtsams te chos bstan cing de rigs pas sgrub dgos kyi /
NK045(bi)004:732: snying po bstan pa don med de de tshur mthong
NK045(bi)004:733: kho nas sgrub mi nus pas sgro skur gyi gnas
NK045(bi)004:735: nang pa'i grub mtha' 'og ma nas blo sbyangs te
NK045(bi)004:736: stong pa chen po rnam grangs min pa'i don la
NK045(bi)004:737: nges pa khyad par can skyes pa dag la rim
NK045(bi)004:738: bzhin bde gshegs snying po'i gtam bstan na gdod yid
NK045(bi)004:740: des na lam rnam dag yin kyang rigs pas skrub
NK045(bi)004:741: mi nus te myong bas rtogs dgos so zhes pa
NK045(bi)004:742: dang / tshur mthong gi lam du ma gyur na
NK045(bi)004:743: lam yang dag min no snyam pa'i rmongs mtshang brtol
NK045(bi)004:744: nas lam sgrub tshul gyi gnad la mkhas par bya
NK045(bi)004:745: dang / dgos so // da ni khams kyi rang
NK045(bi)004:746: bzhin la log par rtog pa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig bzlog
NK045(bi)004:747: dang / dgos so // pa la / mi stong par bden grub tu lta ba bzlog pa /
NK045(bi)004:748: stong pa phyang chad du lta ba bzlog pa /
NK045(bi)004:749: mi rtag par 'dus byas su 'dzin pa bzlog pa'o //
NK045(bi)004:750: dang po ni ji skad du /
NK045(bi)004:751: 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las /
NK045(bi)004:752: byang sems blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba /
NK045(bi)004:753: sangs rgyas kyis mdo sde las de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK045(bi)004:754: snying po dri ma'i sbubs su gnas pa rtag brtan
NK045(bi)004:755: ther zug tu gsungs pa de mu stegs byed kyi
NK045(bi)004:756: bdag tu smra ba dang ji ltar mi 'dra lags
NK045(bi)004:757: / mu stegs byed rnams kyang yon tan med pa
NK045(bi)004:758: sogs kyis bdag tu smra ba yin ces dris pa'i
NK045(bi)004:759: / lan du / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK045(bi)004:761: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam thar sgo gsum dang mya
NK045(bi)004:762: ngan las 'das pa dang ma skyes pa'i tshig gi
NK045(bi)004:763: don rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por bstan
NK045(bi)004:764: par byas nas / byis pa rnams bdag med pas
NK045(bi)004:765: 'jigs par gyur pa'i gnas rnam par spang ba'i don
NK045(bi)004:766: du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i sgo bstan pa'i
NK045(bi)004:767: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gnas snang ba med pa'i
NK045(bi)004:768: spyod yul ston te 'di la blo gros chen po
NK045(bi)004:769: par byas nas / // ma 'ongs pa dang da
NK045(bi)004:770: ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
NK045(bi)004:771: po rnams kyis bdag tu mngon par zhen par mi
NK045(bi)004:772: par byas nas / // bya'o // zhes gsungs pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:773: gzhan yang dngos po'i 'du shes can la thar pa med par gsungs pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:774: rang gi ngo bo ma stong na chos gzhan gyis stong pa yod kyang stong go mi chod de /
NK045(bi)004:775: stong pa bdun gyi nang nas tha shal pa gcig gcig gis stong pa ste /
NK045(bi)004:776: de spang bar bya zhes sogs mtha' yas pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:777: gzhan yang blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
NK045(bi)004:778: rtag pa ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin
NK045(bi)004:779: no // de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di lta ste gnyis kar yang nyes pa 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:781: spros pa bdud kyis bzung ba yin //
NK045(bi)004:782: yod dang med las 'da' bar bya //
NK045(bi)004:784: chos mchog mya ngan 'das pa las lhag pa'i chos
NK045(bi)004:785: zhig yod na de yang sgyu ma dang rmi lam
NK045(bi)004:786: lta bu'o // zhes pa la sogs pa'i lung gi don de bzhin du /
NK045(bi)004:787: rigs pas dpyad na yang bde gshegs snying po ngo
NK045(bi)004:788: bo stong pa yin pa'i gnad kyis sems kyi chos
NK045(bi)004:791: dus ji srid du rtag pa /
NK045(bi)004:793: yon tan rnam pa thams cad par ris med du 'char ba yin gyi /
NK045(bi)004:794: rang gi ngo bo mi stong par bden par grub
NK045(bi)004:795: pa la chos gzhan gyi chos nyid du rung ba
NK045(bi)004:796: sogs rnam pa kun tu mi srid cing don dam
NK045(bi)004:797: dpyod pa'i tshad mas gtan la phab pa'i grub 'bras
NK045(bi)004:798: su yang mi btub ste chos thams cad bden med
NK045(bi)004:799: du dpyod pa'i lag rjes la bden grub gcig 'grub
NK045(bi)004:800: pa ni snang ba las mun pa ltar gnas ma
NK045(bi)004:802: tha snyad dpyod pa'i tshad mas kyang bden grub mi 'grub ste /
NK045(bi)004:803: de'i ngor bden par grub kyang de tsam gyis chos
NK045(bi)004:804: de mi stong par rnam pa kun tu 'grub mi
NK045(bi)004:806: tshad ma gnyis kyis sgrub ma nus par gyur pa
NK045(bi)004:807: la sgrub byed nam mkha'i me tog gi rjes su
NK045(bi)004:808: 'gro bas de sgrub pa don med kyi ngal bar
NK045(bi)004:810: snang stong zung 'jug gi dbyings phyogs ma go ba
NK045(bi)004:811: dag rnam grangs pa'i don dam med dgag tsam la
NK045(bi)004:812: rigs dang chos dbyings dang stong nyid du bzung nas
NK045(bi)004:813: yon tan ye ldan du smra ba'i gzhung la 'gal
NK045(bi)004:814: ba sgrub pa ni shin tu mi rung ste /
NK045(bi)004:815: ye shes phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:816: chos 'dod ma yin rnyed pa don gnyer ba //
NK045(bi)004:817: bsdams pa min dag byang chub slob bo zhes //
NK045(bi)004:818: smra 'gyur kha cig phyi ma'i dus 'byung ste /
NK045(bi)004:819: smra la dga' zhing thams cad stong zhes smra //
NK045(bi)004:821: stong nyid ma skyes sus kyang byas ma yin //
NK045(bi)004:822: ma mthong 'ong ba ma yin 'pho min na //
NK045(bi)004:823: dmigs gnas bdag cag stong nyid legs bslabs zhes //
NK045(bi)004:824: 'dzer pa de dag chos kyi rkun po yin //
NK045(bi)004:826: med pa'i chos la yongs su rtog pa na //
NK045(bi)004:827: byis pa gang yin g.yo ba de yis bcings /
NK045(bi)004:830: phung 'di stong zhes rtogs na'ang byang chub sems dpa' ni //
NK045(bi)004:831: mtshan ma la spyod skye med gnas la dad ma yin //
NK045(bi)004:834: yod dang med ces bya ba gnyis ka mtha' //
NK045(bi)004:835: gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang mtha' yin te //
NK045(bi)004:836: de phyir gnyis ka'i mtha' ni rab spangs nas //
NK045(bi)004:837: mkhas pa dbus la'ang gnas pa yong mi byed //
NK045(bi)004:839: sor phreng la phan pa'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:840: kye ma 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i skyes bu gnyis yod de /
NK045(bi)004:841: gang shin tu stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /
NK045(bi)004:842: gang 'jig rten na bdag tu smra ba 'di gnyis ni dam pa'i chos 'jig pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:843: dam pa'i chos khas 'bubs pa'o zhes dang /
NK045(bi)004:844: lta ba kun 'byin byed kyi gnyen po stong nyid
NK045(bi)004:845: la dngos dngos med du zhen na gsor mi rung
NK045(bi)004:846: ba'i lta bar gsungs pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:847: stong mi stong gang yang dmigs pa las ma 'das
NK045(bi)004:848: la de kun spang dgos par mdo bstan bcos rnams
NK045(bi)004:850: rigs pas brtags na yang bden grub bcad tsam gyi
NK045(bi)004:851: med dgag gi ldog cha de dgag bya bcad pa
NK045(bi)004:852: 'dzin pa'i rtog bcas kyis btags pa tsam las gnas
NK045(bi)004:853: lugs sgro 'dogs bral ba'i phyogs su ma phyin par
NK045(bi)004:854: gting rnyed sla ba'i phyir 'dir mang du brjod mi
NK045(bi)004:855: dgos so // bden stong med dgag gi cha tsam
NK045(bi)004:856: chos dbyings dang gnas lugs mtshan nyid pa min kyang
NK045(bi)004:857: dgos so // / las dang po pas de la
NK045(bi)004:858: 'jug pa'i sgo tsam du yid la bya bar 'os
NK045(bi)004:859: dgos so // / pa yin cing / mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:860: 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las lha'i
NK045(bi)004:861: lo stong du dkon mchog gsum la ci dgos pa
NK045(bi)004:862: byin pa bas / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig
NK045(bi)004:863: tha na se gol gtogs pa srid du 'du byed
NK045(bi)004:864: thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o //
NK045(bi)004:865: 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba'o //
NK045(bi)004:866: 'du byed thams cad ni stong pa'o //
NK045(bi)004:867: 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa'o snyam du
NK045(bi)004:868: dpyod na de de bas bsod nams ches grangs med
NK045(bi)004:872: gzhi bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po nyi ma sprin
NK045(bi)004:873: dang bral ba ltar ji bzhin pa mngon du gyur
NK045(bi)004:874: pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de
NK045(bi)004:875: rtag mi rtag gang yin snyam na mdo rnams las
NK045(bi)004:876: rnam mkhyen nyid res rtag par yang gsungs /
NK045(bi)004:877: res mi rtag par yang gsungs mod kyi de'i don ni 'di lta ste /
NK045(bi)004:878: gnas yongs su ma gyur pa'i gdul bya gzhan gyi
NK045(bi)004:879: bsam ngo dang bstun te rnam mkhyen mi rtag ces
NK045(bi)004:882: tshad ma rtag pa nyid yod min //
NK045(bi)004:883: dngos yod rtogs pa tshad phyir dang //
NK045(bi)004:884: shes bya mi rtag pa nyid kyi //
NK045(bi)004:885: de mi rtag pa nyid phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:887: sems bskyed pa dang stong nyid goms pa la sogs
NK045(bi)004:888: lam gyi rgyu las rnam mkhyen 'byung gi rgyu med
NK045(bi)004:889: du 'byung ba mi rigs pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:890: de chos thams cad la mngon sum pa'i tshad ma yin pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)004:891: tshad ma ste mi bslu ba'i blo yin na rtag
NK045(bi)004:892: pa zhig med de dngos po yod pa la de
NK045(bi)004:893: de bzhin 'jal ba tshad ma yin la /
NK045(bi)004:894: de'i yul shes bya ni mi rtag pa nyid kyi
NK045(bi)004:895: phyir 'jal byed tshad ma de yang mi rtag ste
NK045(bi)004:897: rtag pa yin na don byed pa'i nus pas stong
NK045(bi)004:898: par tshad mas grub pa'i phyir yul 'jal ba la
NK045(bi)004:899: sogs pa'i byed pa mtha' dag gis stong par nges
NK045(bi)004:900: pas na rnam mkhyen ni rtag par shin tu mi
NK045(bi)004:901: rigs te mi rtag par 'grub la /
NK045(bi)004:902: de bzhin dngos po thams cad mi rtag pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:903: dngos med la rtag par btags kyang rtag rgyu'i gzhi
NK045(bi)004:904: med pas rtag pa mtshan nyid pa'i chos gang yang
NK045(bi)004:906: tshul 'di ni phyi rol mu stegs can dang /
NK045(bi)004:907: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid kyi ngo bor
NK045(bi)004:908: gnas gyur pa'i tshul la blo ma sbyangs pa'i theg
NK045(bi)004:909: pa thun mongs pa'i ngor de ltar sgrub dgos te
NK045(bi)004:910: / rnam shes kyi ngor snang tshul la de las gzhan du 'char ba'i thabs ci yang med do //
NK045(bi)004:911: 'on kyang gnas yongs su gyur pa'i ye shes kyi
NK045(bi)004:912: gzigs pa'i dbang du byas na rnam mkhyen rtag par
NK045(bi)004:913: 'grub ste / de mi rtag pa'i sgrub byed du
NK045(bi)004:914: bkod pa'i shes bya skad cig mar skye 'gag byed
NK045(bi)004:915: 'grub ste / pa dang / yul can ye shes
NK045(bi)004:916: kyang skad cig rim can du 'byung ba sogs ni
NK045(bi)004:917: gnas yongs su ma gyur pa rnams kyi snang dor
NK045(bi)004:918: de ltar snang bar zad kyi /
NK045(bi)004:919: gnas tshul don la de kho na ltar grub pa ni ma yin te /
NK045(bi)004:920: chos gang yang skad cig gcig tu skye ba'ang med na /
NK045(bi)004:921: des brtsams pa'i dus kyi go rim sogs ma grub pa lta ci smos te /
NK045(bi)004:922: dper na rmi lam rang ngo'i snang ba la snga
NK045(bi)004:923: phyi'i dus kyi mtha' dang phyogs kyi cha mu med
NK045(bi)004:924: par sna tshogs su snang yang de ltar ma grub
NK045(bi)004:925: pa bzhin no // des na chos nyid skye 'gag
NK045(bi)004:926: med pa'i don de bzhin du gnas yongs su gyur
NK045(bi)004:927: pa'i ye shes mthar thug pa na /
NK045(bi)004:928: shes dang shes bya dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyi sku yin cing /
NK045(bi)004:929: gnas ma gyur pa'i skabs na yang sems kyi gshis
NK045(bi)004:930: sam chos nyid zung 'jug rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
NK045(bi)004:931: ba ni 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)004:932: snga phyi'i khyad med par rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rigs zhes bya la /
NK045(bi)004:933: 'gyur bcas glo bur 'bral rung gi dri ma gang
NK045(bi)004:934: dag skad cig ma'i skye 'gag rim gyis 'byung ba
NK045(bi)004:935: dang / 'khor 'das dang bzang ngan la sogs pa'i
NK045(bi)004:936: mi mnyam pa 'di ni gnas ma gyur pa'i gnyis
NK045(bi)004:937: snang can la de ltar bslu med bsnyon med du
NK045(bi)004:938: dang / snang yang / gshis la skye 'gag dang
NK045(bi)004:939: gnyis chos ma grub par mnyam pa chen por gnas
NK045(bi)004:940: dang / snang yang / pa / de'i ngang du
NK045(bi)004:941: phyogs kyi cha dang dus kyi 'gyur ba thams cad
NK045(bi)004:942: dang / snang yang / pa / 'ub chub cing
NK045(bi)004:943: / de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi so so rang
NK045(bi)004:944: rig pa'i ye shes kyi yul du yod pa yin
NK045(bi)004:945: dang / snang yang / pa / 'ub chub cing
NK045(bi)004:946: / cing / dus gsum gyi 'gyur bas bslad du
NK045(bi)004:947: med pas na de la rtag pa chen po'i tha
NK045(bi)004:949: yod pa gang zhig skad cig gi skye 'gag can min pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:950: 'di ltar 'gyur ba can dngos po thams cad dang
NK045(bi)004:951: dngos med nam mkha' la sogs pa phyogs dus kyi
NK045(bi)004:952: shes bya thams cad ro mnyam par chos nyid de'i
NK045(bi)004:954: chos nyid de 'gyur ba can la sogs pa'i chos can gang gis kyang bsdus pa ma yin te /
NK045(bi)004:955: dper na nam mkha'i khongs su sprin 'dus kyang /
NK045(bi)004:956: sprin gyi khongs su nam mkha' mi 'dus pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)004:957: des na chos nyid mnyam pa chen po dbyings 'od
NK045(bi)004:958: gsal ba'i gshis de ni rang byung gi ye shes
NK045(bi)004:959: nyag gcig gis rang bzhin gyis dngos po kun la
NK045(bi)004:960: khyab par lhan skyes su gnas kyang /
NK045(bi)004:961: glo bur gyi dri ma can la rang gi rang bzhin mngon du ma gyur pa na /
NK045(bi)004:962: dri ma de sel byed lam lngas bsdus pa'i spang
NK045(bi)004:963: rtogs kyi mthu las shes dang shes bya dbyer med
NK045(bi)004:964: pa'i ye shes chen po de thob pa na /
NK045(bi)004:965: rang byung gi ye shes 'gyur ba med pa'i shes
NK045(bi)004:966: pa thams cad chos nyid kyi gshis su ro mnyam
NK045(bi)004:967: par mi rtog bzhin 'bad med lhun grub tu mkhyen
NK045(bi)004:968: pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob
NK045(bi)004:969: bo // 'on kyang tshul des rang byung gi ye shes rgyu las skyes par mi 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)004:970: yang dag par glo bur dri bral gyi chos sku de bral ba'i 'bras bur song ba yin la /
NK045(bi)004:971: rgyu las gsar du skye ba ltar snang ba yang
NK045(bi)004:972: gnas ma gyur pa'i snang tshul la de ltar snang
NK045(bi)004:973: bar zad kyi / yang dag pa'i don du chos
NK045(bi)004:974: nyid kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku'i ngo bo la
NK045(bi)004:975: skye 'jig med par chos thams cad gdod nas mnyam
NK045(bi)004:976: pa nyid du mngon par sangs rgyas pa'am /
NK045(bi)004:977: gzod ma nas zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa /
NK045(bi)004:978: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba sogs zab mo'i mdo
NK045(bi)004:979: sde rnams kyi dgongs pa mthar thug 'di dag pa'i
NK045(bi)004:980: sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang bsam par dka' ba'i gnas
NK045(bi)004:981: yin na phal pas lta ci smros /
NK045(bi)004:982: 'on kyang tshul bzhin yid ches skyes na phyir mi
NK045(bi)004:983: ldog par lung bstan thob pa dang mtshungs par basngagasa
NK045(bi)004:984: pa'i phyir tshul 'di la mos par bya'o //
NK045(bi)004:985: tshul de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku rtag par bltas na bsod nams 'byung ste /
NK045(bi)004:986: rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul
NK045(bi)004:987: gyis ting nge 'dzin zhes pa'i mdo las 'jam dpal
NK045(bi)004:988: rigs kyi bu'am rigs bu mo gang la las lha'i
NK045(bi)004:989: bskal pa bye bar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
NK045(bi)004:990: re rer 'khor bzhi la ji 'dod pa'i sbyin pa
NK045(bi)004:991: byin pa bas / rigs kyi bu'ang rigs kyi bu
NK045(bi)004:992: mo gang gzhan gyis mthun par bya ba'i don du
NK045(bi)004:993: byin pa bas / g.yos / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa'o //
NK045(bi)004:994: de bzhin gshegs pa ni g.yung drung ngo //
NK045(bi)004:995: zhes tshig tu smra na yang de de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par byed do //
NK045(bi)004:997: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:998: 'od srung rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag
NK045(bi)004:999: ni rtag tu rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)004:1000: rtag pa dang gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di
NK045(bi)004:1003: gang gis bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la rtag
NK045(bi)004:1004: pa'i 'du shes kyis nan tan byed na de ni
NK045(bi)004:1005: skyabs su 'gro ba'i gnas yin no //
NK045(bi)004:1007: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mi rtag par blta ba la skyabs 'gro tsam yang med pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:1008: rdo rje'i sku la mi rtag par bltas na nyes
NK045(bi)004:1009: dmigs tshad med pa 'byung bar mdo las gsungs par
NK045(bi)004:1010: ltar shes par byas nas yang dag pa'i don la
NK045(bi)004:1012: de ltar bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po rang gi
NK045(bi)004:1013: ngo bo ni yod med rtag chad la sogs pa'i
NK045(bi)004:1014: spros pa thams cad bral ba bden pa dbyer med
NK045(bi)004:1015: thig le nyag gcig mnyam pa nyid de /
NK045(bi)004:1016: gnas lugs de'i ngang du snang srid kyi chos thams
NK045(bi)004:1017: cad ro gcig pa de kho na nyid du gyur
NK045(bi)004:1018: pa de de bzhin du mthong ba ni yang dag
NK045(bi)004:1019: pa bsal bzhag med pa'i don mthong bas 'dzin pa
NK045(bi)004:1020: mtha' dag dang bral ba ni don dam rtogs pa'i
NK045(bi)004:1022: byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa zhes pa'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:1023: 'jam dpal sus chos thams cad mi mnyam pa med
NK045(bi)004:1024: la gnyis su med cing gnyis su med par mthong
NK045(bi)004:1025: ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
NK045(bi)004:1027: nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:1028: dngos dang dngos med rnam shes shing //
NK045(bi)004:1029: yang dag mtha' la gang gnas pa //
NK045(bi)004:1030: dngos po dang ni dngos med pa //
NK045(bi)004:1031: lta ba mkhas pas mi 'dzin to //
NK045(bi)004:1033: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las /
NK045(bi)004:1034: don dam par 'phags pa'i shes rab dang ye shes
NK045(bi)004:1035: kyi mdun na chos gang yang yongs su shes pa'am
NK045(bi)004:1036: / spang pa'am bsgom pa'am mngon du bya bar 'gyur ba ni chos gang yang mi 'dug go //
NK045(bi)004:1038: 'on kyang tha snyad dpyod pa'i tshad mas shan legs
NK045(bi)004:1039: par 'byed pa'i skabs su bden pa la bden par
NK045(bi)004:1040: shes pa 'phags pa'i lam mi bslu bar shes pa
NK045(bi)004:1041: lta bu dang / mi bden pa la mi bden
NK045(bi)004:1042: par shes pa bdag bsgoms pas grol bar smra ba
NK045(bi)004:1043: la log par shes pa lta bu dang /
NK045(bi)004:1044: mi rtag pa la mi rtag par shes pa 'dus
NK045(bi)004:1045: byas kyi dngos po thams cad skad cig mar shes
NK045(bi)004:1046: pa dang / rtag pa la rtag par shes pa
NK045(bi)004:1047: bde gshegs snying po rang byung gi ye shes rnam
NK045(bi)004:1048: pa thams cad pa mi 'gyur bar shes pa dang
NK045(bi)004:1049: pa dang / / med pa la med par shes
NK045(bi)004:1050: pa bdag dang gzung 'dzin du snang ba rang bzhin
NK045(bi)004:1051: ma grub par shes pa lta bu dang /
NK045(bi)004:1052: yod pa la yod par 'dzin pa rgyu 'bras bslu med rten 'brel gyi snang tshul dang /
NK045(bi)004:1053: sems can thams cad la chos nyid bde gshegs snying
NK045(bi)004:1054: po lhun gyis grub pa'i yon tan rang bzhin gyi
NK045(bi)004:1055: gnas par shes pa lta bu la sogs pa ni
NK045(bi)004:1056: tha snyad du dngos po'i yin lugs la phyin ci
NK045(bi)004:1057: ma log pa'i shes rab kyi 'dzin stangs yin pas
NK045(bi)004:1058: de ltar shes shing bzhugs pa las yon tan rgya
NK045(bi)004:1059: chen po thob ste gti mug med pa'i dge ba'i
NK045(bi)004:1060: rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)004:1061: de ltar mdo sde rnams las kyang spyir btang dang
NK045(bi)004:1062: dmigs kyis bsal ba'i sgo nas chos du ma bstan
NK045(bi)004:1063: cing / khyad par du gang zag gi bdag med kyang /
NK045(bi)004:1064: bdag dang bdag med kyi spros pa gnyis las 'das
NK045(bi)004:1065: pa'i bde gshegs snying po ni bdag chen por gsungs
NK045(bi)004:1066: pa sogs gtsang bde rtag bdag gi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)004:1067: phyin pa'i yon tan mchog tu bstan pa ni mi
NK045(bi)004:1068: gnas pa'i myang 'das chen po zhi ba bsil ba
NK045(bi)004:1069: gya nom pa mthar thug pa'i yon tan 'gyur ba
NK045(bi)004:1070: med pa yod pa la yod par shes pa'i slad
NK045(bi)004:1071: du ste / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:1072: bdag ces bya ba ni chos gang bden pa yang dag par rtag pa /
NK045(bi)004:1073: bdag por gyur pa mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba de ni bdag ces bya ste /
NK045(bi)004:1074: zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)004:1075: de ltar zab mo bde gshegs snying po'i tshul 'di
NK045(bi)004:1076: bshad pa thos nas mos pa tsam la'ang phan yon
NK045(bi)004:1077: tshad med pa 'byung ste rgyud bla ma las /
NK045(bi)004:1078: blo ldan rgyal ba'i yul de la mos pa //
NK045(bi)004:1079: sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs kyi snod 'gyur te //
NK045(bi)004:1080: bsam med yon tan tshogs la mngon dga' bas //
NK045(bi)004:1081: sems can kun gyi bsod nams zil gyis gnon //
NK045(bi)004:1082: gang zhig byang chub don du gnyer bas gser zhing nor bus spras pa ni //
NK045(bi)004:1083: sangs rgyas zhing rdul mnyam pa nyin re chos rgyal rnams la rtag 'bul na //
NK045(bi)004:1084: gzhan gang 'di las tshig tsam thos shing thos nas kyang ni mos na 'di //
NK045(bi)004:1085: sbyin pa las byung dge ba de las bsod nams ches mang thob par 'gyur //
NK045(bi)004:1086: blo ldan gang zhig bla med byang chub 'dod pas bskal pa du mar yang //
NK045(bi)004:1087: lus ngag yid kyi 'bad pa med par tshul khrims dri med srub byed pa //
NK045(bi)004:1088: gzhan gang 'di las tshig tsam thos shing thos nas kyang ni mos na 'di //
NK045(bi)004:1089: tshul khrims las byung dge ba de las bsod nams ches mang thob par 'gyur //
NK045(bi)004:1090: gang zhig 'di na srid pa gsum gyi nyon mongs med 'jil bsam gtan ni //
NK045(bi)004:1091: lha dang tshangs gnas mthar son rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'pho med thabs bsgoms la //
NK045(bi)004:1092: gzhan gang 'di las tshig tsam thos shing thos nas kyang ni mos na 'di //
NK045(bi)004:1093: bsam gtan las byung dge ba de las bsod nams ches mang thob par 'gyur //
NK045(bi)004:1095: de ltar zab cing gting dpag dka' la /
NK045(bi)004:1096: shes shing mos na don che zhing theg pa mchog
NK045(bi)004:1097: gi snying po phyir mi ldog pa'i seng ge'i sgra
NK045(bi)004:1098: bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po'i gtam bstan pa 'di
NK045(bi)004:1099: ni ches zab mo phul du byung ba'i phyir /
NK045(bi)004:1100: sngon sbyangs chung zhing blo dman pa dag mos par dka' ste /
NK045(bi)004:1101: de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:1102: nga yi ye shes 'di la ni //
NK045(bi)004:1103: byis pa'i blo can the tshom za //
NK045(bi)004:1104: gnas mi 'gyur te nam mkha' la //
NK045(bi)004:1105: ji ltar mda' 'phangs lhung ba bzhin //
NK045(bi)004:1107: rnam pa 'thag pa bsdus pa'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:1108: de ltar mi blun po de dag ngan song du 'gro bar bdud kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)004:1109: de la'ang skyon 'dogs pa sems so //
NK045(bi)004:1110: de bzhin gshegs pas gnang pa'i chos smra ba de dag la yang skyon 'dogs par sems so //
NK045(bi)004:1112: tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa las /
NK045(bi)004:1113: legs par gsungs pa'i chos ni ston pa na //
NK045(bi)004:1114: sdig pa'i spyod yul can te mi 'thad 'dzin //
NK045(bi)004:1115: dad med chos la som nyi bskyed na ni //
NK045(bi)004:1116: bskal ba bye ba mang po smyon par 'gyur //
NK045(bi)004:1117: ma dad pa yi bsam pas sdig can 'gyur //
NK045(bi)004:1118: blo sdang gang gi yid kyang srung mi byed //
NK045(bi)004:1119: snying po can kun rnam par spangs nas ni //
NK045(bi)004:1120: dad pa med pas snyigs ma 'dzin par byed //
NK045(bi)004:1121: 'gying bar byed cing rtag tu khengs pa ste //
NK045(bi)004:1122: ma dad de ni gzhan la 'dud mi byed //
NK045(bi)004:1124: de dag chos min tshig gis 'gal bar byed //
NK045(bi)004:1125: rgyal ba rnams kyi bsnyan la dri ma des //
NK045(bi)004:1126: mu stegs can ltar the tshom som nyi bcas //
NK045(bi)004:1127: des ni chos la klags gtong 'gal byas nas //
NK045(bi)004:1128: dad med de ni chos kyang spong ba byed //
NK045(bi)004:1130: tshul 'chal tshar gcod pa'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:1134: bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa byed pa skyes bu
NK045(bi)004:1135: dam pa ma yin pa de lta bu dag gis
NK045(bi)004:1136: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rab tu gang bar 'gyur ro
NK045(bi)004:1137: // zhes sogs gsungs pa'i tshul la bsams te dus
NK045(bi)004:1138: kyi snyigs ma bdo zhing bstan zhabs su skyes pa
NK045(bi)004:1139: rnams rton pa bzhi go log pa'i tshul gyis theg
NK045(bi)004:1140: pa mchog gi ring lugs kyi gnad phar cher nyams
NK045(bi)004:1141: shing chos ltar bcos pa byung ba na /
NK045(bi)004:1142: theg chen lam gyi srog lta bu 'di la phangs pa'i sems su byed pa'ang dkon mod kyi /
NK045(bi)004:1143: snga 'gyur rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i bstan zhabs su skyes pa'i stobs kyis /
NK045(bi)004:1144: brgyud pa'i zhal lung rin po che du ma mthong zhing thos pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:1145: rgyal dbang pad+ma'i rgyal tshab 'jam dpal gzhon nu mi
NK045(bi)004:1146: yi rnam par rol pa kun mkhyen rdo rje gzi
NK045(bi)004:1147: brjid sogs yang dag pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen du
NK045(bi)004:1148: ma'i zhabs pad spyi bos len pa'i skal ba bzang
NK045(bi)004:1149: por gyur pa'i mthu las na tshod dang blo gros
NK045(bi)004:1150: ma smin pa bdag kyang zab mo'i gnas 'di la
NK045(bi)004:1151: cung zad spobs pa skyes pa yin no //
NK045(bi)004:1152: 'di ltar mtha' kun bral ba'i zung 'jug rab tu
NK045(bi)004:1153: mi gnas pa'i tshul chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin du
NK045(bi)004:1154: gnas pa rigs kyi don legs par smra ba 'di
NK045(bi)004:1155: ni seng ge'i sgra yin te /
NK045(bi)004:1156: tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:1157: lha'i bu chos gang la yang mngon par ma chags
NK045(bi)004:1158: par brjod pa de dag seng ge'i sgra yin no
NK045(bi)004:1159: // gang de lta bu la mngon par chags par
NK045(bi)004:1160: brjod pa de dag ni seng ge'i sgra ma yin
NK045(bi)004:1161: // te wa'i sgra'o // gang lta ba kun tu
NK045(bi)004:1162: slong ba ston pa de dag la seng ge'i sgra
NK045(bi)004:1163: // te wa'i sgra'o // med do // zhes dang /
NK045(bi)004:1165: seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa ni sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod pa dang /
NK045(bi)004:1166: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu gnas shing mi 'pho bar nges par bshad pa'o //
NK045(bi)004:1168: rigs kyi bu gnas stong par mang du bshad kyang seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes mi bya ste /
NK045(bi)004:1169: mkhas pa shes rab can gyi 'khor mang po'i nang
NK045(bi)004:1170: du bsgrags pa ni seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs
NK045(bi)004:1171: pa zhes bya'o // de la seng ge'i sgra sgrogs
NK045(bi)004:1172: pa ni chos thams cad mi rtag pa sdug bsngal
NK045(bi)004:1173: ba bdag med pa yongs su ma dag pa zhes
NK045(bi)004:1174: pa zhes bya'o // mi 'chad de / de bzhin
NK045(bi)004:1175: gshegs pa rtag pa bde ba bdag dang yongs su
NK045(bi)004:1177: zhes sogs seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i dpe don rgya cher gsungs pas mtshon te shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)004:1178: gal te de ltar bde bar gshegs pa'i rang lam
NK045(bi)004:1179: drang por smras pa kha cig dang ma mthun yang
NK045(bi)004:1180: / yang dag pa'i lam rnam par bzhag pa yin pas gzhan khong 'khrugs bar mi bya ste /
NK045(bi)004:1182: bstan bcos las dpyad rtsod la chags pa'i phyir //
NK045(bi)004:1183: ma mdzad rnam grol phyir ni de nyid bstan //
NK045(bi)004:1184: gal te de nyid rnam par bshad pa na //
NK045(bi)004:1185: gzhan gzhung 'jig par 'gyur na nyes pa med //
NK045(bi)004:1187: de lta bu'i tshul 'di chos srung ba'ang yin te /
NK045(bi)004:1189: de la chos srung ba gang zhe na /
NK045(bi)004:1190: 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos la smod pa rnams chos dang mthun par tshar gcod pa'o //
NK045(bi)004:1192: chos 'dzin pa yang yin par nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa las /
NK045(bi)004:1193: rgyal ba'i byang chub mtshan nyid gang brnyes pa //
NK045(bi)004:1194: chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni yongs 'dzin cing //
NK045(bi)004:1195: gang gis rdul med mtha' 'di rab shes pa /
NK045(bi)004:1196: de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin yin //
NK045(bi)004:1198: de ltar chos bzung ba de ni sangs rgyas la byas pa gzo ba dang /
NK045(bi)004:1199: bsod nams tshad med pa'ang 'thob ste /
NK045(bi)004:1200: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po nges par bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:1201: 'di ltar rgyal ba'i chos kyis nyer gnas shing //
NK045(bi)004:1202: chos kyis nges par 'byung gi zang zing min //
NK045(bi)004:1203: de bas gang zhig bde gshegs chos 'dzin pa //
NK045(bi)004:1204: de ni sangs rgyas kun la byas pa gzo //
NK045(bi)004:1206: nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK045(bi)004:1207: ji ltar bskal pa bye ba stong brjod kyang /
NK045(bi)004:1208: sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yod ma yin ltar /
NK045(bi)004:1209: de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa yi //
NK045(bi)004:1210: bsod nams de yang tshad yod ma yin no //
NK045(bi)004:1212: 'di na theg pa mchog gi gzhung lugs la //
NK045(bi)004:1213: cung zad smra ba'i spobs pa rgyas gyur kyang //
NK045(bi)004:1214: na tshod gzhon zhing sbyang ba ma smin pa //
NK045(bi)004:1215: ban smyon bdag gi ngag la sus yid rton //
NK045(bi)004:1216: deng dus skye bo grags pa'i rjes su 'brangs //
NK045(bi)004:1217: tshul dang tshul min dpyod pa'i blo gros bral //
NK045(bi)004:1218: phal cher phrag dog gdon gyis rnam par dkrugs //
NK045(bi)004:1219: legs bshad smra ba'i dus min bdag gis 'tshal //
NK045(bi)004:1220: 'on kyang bla ma mchog dang lhag pa'i lha //
NK045(bi)004:1221: snying gi pad+mora rtag tu gus mchod pas //
NK045(bi)004:1222: gzhung bzang rnams kyi tshig dang don gyi cha //
NK045(bi)004:1223: gsal ba gsal bar rig pa'i dbyings su shar //
NK045(bi)004:1224: de tshe legs bshad goms pa lhur len la //
NK045(bi)004:1225: dga' ba yun ring skyes nas phyi ma'i mur //
NK045(bi)004:1226: zhing gzhan du yang rgyal ba'i chos tshul la //
NK045(bi)004:1227: spro ba dam pa yar ngo'i zla ba bzhin //
NK045(bi)004:1228: zab mo'i mthar thug pa yi gtam 'di las //
NK045(bi)004:1229: blo ldan dga' ba skye 'gyur de lta bu //
NK045(bi)004:1230: srid zhi'i mthar lhung bde ba gang gis min //
NK045(bi)004:1231: de phyir skal bzang tshogs kyi dga' ston lags //
NK045(bi)004:1232: mngon par zhen pa mtha' dag spangs pa yi //
NK045(bi)004:1233: snang stong zung 'jug theg mchog seng ge'i sgras //
NK045(bi)004:1234: lta ngan ri dwags tshogs rnams zil gnon zhing //
NK045(bi)004:1235: rgyal bstan snying por phyogs bcur rgyas gyur cig /
NK045(bi)004:1236: ces pa 'di yang bslab gsum nor bu'i mdzod 'chang chos kyi mched po gu na'i ming can gyis /
NK045(bi)004:1237: rdzogs sangs sku ni 'phro phyir sogs kyi rnam bshad
NK045(bi)004:1238: yid ngor gang thon zhig bris zhes ched bskul ngor
NK045(bi)004:1239: ban+de blo gros dri med kyis shar mar bris pa
NK045(bi)004:1240: dge legs 'phel / 'di'i rtsom dpe rje bla ma'i
NK045(bi)004:1241: phyag dpe'i khrod du 'tshebs nas lo skor tshar gnyis
NK045(bi)004:1242: son pa'i rjes su slar yang dpe rnyed pa dang
NK045(bi)004:1243: dus mtshungs par bla ma dam pa lung rtogs nas
NK045(bi)004:1245: sngar gyi skul ba po yang der 'dzoms pa dang
NK045(bi)004:1246: mkhyin ldan legs pa'i blo gros bcas kyis da dung
NK045(bi)004:1247: bskyar bsnan sogs dgos na cis kyang gyis zhes bskul
NK045(bi)004:1248: ba la brten nas sngar gyi rtsom dpe'i tshig sna
NK045(bi)004:1249: 'ga' zhig bsdus / gnad re zung gsar bsnan bcas
NK045(bi)004:1250: rab tshes lcags yos sa ga zla ba'i dmar phyogs
NK045(bi)004:1251: kyi gral tshes dge bar sgrub khang bdud las rnam
NK045(bi)004:1252: rgyal gling du blo gros dri med 'jam dpal dgyes
NK045(bi)004:1253: pa'i rdo rjes zhag gnyis la ngos bshus grub par
NK045(bi)004:1256: rgyal ba mi yi seng ge thub dbang gis //
NK045(bi)004:1257: gdul bya'i khams dbang rjes mthun bsam yas kyi //
NK045(bi)004:1258: 'dul byed gang gsung theg pa'i snying po mchog /
NK045(bi)004:1259: 'khor lo bar tha gnyis po 'di yin zhes /
NK045(bi)004:1261: 1 / yang yang bka' stsal bka' dang bstan bcos gnyis //
NK045(bi)004:1262: gnad du dril nas snga 'gyur rig 'dzin gyi //
NK045(bi)004:1263: rjes 'brang tshad ma gsum gyis snang byed po //
NK045(bi)004:1264: mi pham phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i sde /
NK045(bi)004:1266: 2 / chos dang ston pa rab tu gsal byed po'i //
NK045(bi)004:1267: bka' drin gzo phyir bstan pa'i zhabs 'degs dang //
NK045(bi)004:1268: rang gi bag chags bzang po 'jog phyir du //
NK045(bi)004:1269: ye ge'i phyi mo spar du bskrun pa lags /
NK045(bi)004:1271: 3 / 'dis mtshon dus gsum legs byas dge tshogs kun //
NK045(bi)004:1272: ris med bstan dang bstan 'dzin dar rgyas shing //
NK045(bi)004:1273: bshad sgrub phrin las nyi ltar rab gsal te /
NK045(bi)004:1274: phyogs las rnam par rgyal phyir yongs su bsngo /
NK045(bi)004:1276: 4 / mkha' mnyam yid can ma rig duhkha las //
NK045(bi)004:1277: rnam grol thos bsam sgom pa'i snod gyur nas //
NK045(bi)004:1278: lam lnga sa bcu'i bgrod pa mthar phyin te //
NK045(bi)004:1279: rnam mkhyen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob gyur cig 5 /
NK045(bi)004:1280: bdag ni deng nas tshe rabs thams cad du //
NK045(bi)004:1281: phyogs lhung bsam ngan rgyud la mi skye zhing //
NK045(bi)004:1282: theg chen bdud rtsi'i chos la longs spyod nas //
NK045(bi)004:1283: ris med bstan la bya ba byed par shog 6 /
NK045(bi)004:1284: rgyal dang rgyal sras rig 'dzin byang sems kyis //
NK045(bi)004:1285: ji ltar thugs bskyed phrin las ma lus pa //
NK045(bi)004:1286: de de bzhin du bdag gcig gis bsgrubs nas //
NK045(bi)004:1287: khams gsum 'khor ba dong nas sprugs gyur cig 7 /
NK045(bi)004:1288: ces pa'ang zhu dag pa pun+ye yush+ti sh+tha nas /
NK045(bi)004:1289: spar yon sbyor skabs rdo rje'i bden smon rang sor bzhag pa'o //
